briefTitle: Development of Distress Management Algorithms Using Mobile Device Based Health Logs in Breast Cancer Survivors
officialTitle: Development of Distress Management Algorithms Using Mobile Device Based Health Logs in Breast Cancer Survivors
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Efficacy of distress screening of wearable device
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Stage 0-III breast cancer

Exclusion Criteria:

* Stage IV breast cancer
* Breast cancer recurrence or metastasis
* Severe medical illness
